violations.description: Ensures an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
violations.help_text: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

instances.fix_suggestion:
Fix all of the following:
  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-selected="true"

Fix all of the following:
  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-selected="false"

Fix all of the following:
  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-selected="false"

violations.description: Ensures every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name
violations.help_text: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

instances.fix_suggestion:
Fix any of the following:
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute

violations.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
violations.help_text: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

instances.fix_suggestion:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has children which are not allowed: button[aria-label]
  Element uses aria-busy="true" while showing a loader

violations.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help_text: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

instances.fix_suggestion:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.75 (foreground color: #efac78, background color: #fdf2ea, font size: 30.0pt (40px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 3:1

Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.6 (foreground color: #cccccc, background color: #ffffff, font size: 11.3pt (15px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.27 (foreground color: #ee76ad, background color: #fce7f1, font size: 14.4pt (19.2px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

violations.description: Ensure touch target have sufficient size and space
violations.help_text: All touch targets must be 24px large, or leave sufficient space

instances.fix_suggestion:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (10px by 10px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 12px instead of at least 24px.

manual_review_needed.reason: Alt text quality requires human review to verify accuracy
Caption quality and accuracy requires manual review
Audio description accuracy requires manual review
Live caption quality requires manual review
Audio description completeness requires manual review
Sensory characteristics usage requires manual review
Full keyboard accessibility requires manual testing
Link purpose in context requires manual review
Heading and label descriptiveness requires manual review
Unusual word definitions require content review
Reading level assessment requires content review
Component identification consistency requires cross-page review
Error message clarity requires manual review
Error suggestion helpfulness requires manual review
